description.en: Portrait-style confrontation of Georg Carl von Döbeln and Russian commander Nikolaj Kamenskij, with the two armies forming distant background masses.

narration.en: In the foreground, Döbeln and the Russian commander face one another — stern, composed, and inches apart — as columns of Swedish and Russian troops stretch away into the landscape behind them, lowered muskets and distant banners marking each force.

info: Layout: Hero (single full-panel). ActionSquare centered on the two commanders; primary focus must be Döbeln (left) and Nikolaj Kamenskij (right) in medium-close portrait framing. Place both armies as background masses (low-detail silhouettes) to convey scale but keep foreground figures sharply rendered. Follow character visual identity and uniform rules from main-characters.json and soldier.json (Döbeln: Swedish officer — dark blue tunic, yellow facings, correct shako detailing; Kamenskij: Russian officer in dark green with red facings). Canvas size and no-gutter rules per page-layout.json Hero spec. This replaces the existing Page 2 Panel 1 entry in storyboard.json. No text or speech balloons in the image.
